faqs.question: How do I change my address?
faqs.answer: If you need to change your address, please log in to your account online and make the necessary changes on the "My Profile" page.

faqs.question: How do I track the status of a claim?
faqs.answer: It's best to track your claim status within our app or online. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.

faqs.question: How can I make payments?
faqs.answer: With Insurance Co., you can make payments online, via phone or right here on our app.

faqs.question: What happens after I make a claim?
faqs.answer:
1. The liability examiner reviews the insurance policy and the coverage in effect for the loss to determine what types of damage or injuries are covered.
2. The liability examiner attempts to contact everyone involved in the accident - drivers, passengers, witnesses, etc. - to get everyone's account of the accident.
3. When there are conflicting versions of what occurred in the accident, the liability examiner conducts an in-depth interview with each person involved. These interviews help resolve disputes over the facts of the accident.
4. The liability examiner gathers and reviews additional relevant information, such as the police report, applicable state and local traffic laws, and photos of the scene and the vehicles involved.
5. The liability examiner considers all the facts, determines the cause of the accident, and handles the claim accordingly

faqs.question: How do I report a claim on my app?
faqs.answer:
To report your claim, select the type of claim you need to report.
You will then be asked to provide:
    the state where the incident occurred
    the date and time it happened
    a general description of what happened.
Throughout the report we may ask you for additional information such as contact information for other parties, vehicle locations, property owner information, and police report details. While this information is helpful to have as soon as possible, you can still report your claim without it.

faqs.question: When will I be contacted after making a claim?
faqs.answer: We will follow up with you right away. Once you complete the claim report we will send you a confirmation email and you will be able to view and manage your claim right away. A claim examiner will call you to explain the next steps, confirm the details, and arrange for an auto damage adjuster to inspect your vehicle damage. This examiner will also be able to answer any questions you may have. (If you submit your claim later than 8:00 p.m., we will usually call you the next morning.)

faqs.question: What is rental reimbursement?
faqs.answer: Rental Reimbursement is an optional coverage that helps pay your rental car costs while your car is being repaired as a result of a covered claim. You can generally keep the rental car until your damaged vehicle is back on the road or until your coverage limit runs out, whichever comes first. If your vehicle is a total loss, the amount of authorized rental time will be limited, so you should begin shopping for a replacement as soon as you learn your vehicle is a total loss.
